items.summary: Fix the audio recording upload + share flow so that clicking “Save” then confirming “Share with team? → Yes” successfully (1) uploads/saves the recording and (2) sets it as shared, making it visible on the Team tab for other participants, including when the app is opened from a Caffeine draft domain.

Update backend storage/upload origin validation (the cause of “error disallowed origin”) to allow the frontend origins used by Caffeine deployments so recording uploads are accepted from both draft and live app domains.

Improve client-side error handling for recording save/share so users always get a clear English error message when an upload/share fails (including disallowed-origin failures), and the UI state resets appropriately (no stuck “Saving…” state).
